intro: Stenandrium affine, commonly known as the slender stenandrium, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and small, opposite leaves. Its flowers are typically white or pale green, with four petals and prominent stamens. Stenandrium affine is often found in humid, shaded environments within lowland rainforests.
